concepts.name: The Loop
concepts.definition: A self-improving intelligence substrate where discoveries feed improvements, which enable better discoveries, following a DISCOVER → VALIDATE → IMPROVE cycle
concepts.source_quote: CommandCenter is not a collection of tools. It is The Loop - a self-improving intelligence substrate where discoveries feed improvements, which enable better discoveries.

concepts.name: CommandCenter
concepts.definition: An implementation of The Loop - a self-improving intelligence substrate with multiple components working in a unified cycle
concepts.source_quote: CommandCenter is not a collection of tools. It is The Loop - a self-improving intelligence substrate

concepts.name: Wander
concepts.definition: Discovery engine that explores idea space, finds unexpected connections, and uses dwelling prompts to explore
concepts.source_quote: Wander: Explores idea space, finds unexpected connections

concepts.name: AI Arena
concepts.definition: Testing component that compares models, approaches, and finds what works through benchmarking
concepts.source_quote: AI Arena: Tests models, compares approaches, finds what works

concepts.name: Prompt Improver
concepts.definition: Component that makes prompts better based on learnings from The Loop, using Crystal quality signals
concepts.source_quote: Prompt Improver: Makes prompts better based on learnings

concepts.name: Skills
concepts.definition: Rewritable capabilities that are improved by agents using discoveries, can be updated mid-session and compound without human intervention
concepts.source_quote: Skills: Rewritten by agents using discoveries

concepts.name: Research Hub
concepts.definition: Component that tracks research tasks and surfaces what needs exploration in the discovery phase
concepts.source_quote: Research Hub: Tracks research tasks, surfaces what needs exploration

concepts.name: KnowledgeBeast
concepts.definition: Knowledge storage and retrieval system that stores and retrieves knowledge for exploration, indexes Crystals and Skills
concepts.source_quote: KnowledgeBeast: Stores and retrieves knowledge for exploration

concepts.name: Crystals
concepts.definition: Insights that survive scrutiny from Wander exploration, used as quality signals for Prompt Improver
concepts.source_quote: Crystals: Insights that survive scrutiny (from Wander)

concepts.name: Research Workbench
concepts.definition: Human interface to The Loop providing views into Wander Mind Map, AI Arena Compare, Skills Editor, Research Hub, Tech Radar, and Prompt Improver
concepts.source_quote: Human Interface: Research Workbench... All views into the same underlying Loop

concepts.name: RLM REPL
concepts.definition: Agent interface to The Loop providing programmatic access to knowledge, exploration, testing, improvement, and skills
concepts.source_quote: Agent Interface: RLM REPL + MCP... Agents access the same substrate through code

concepts.name: Technology Radar
concepts.definition: Component that monitors external landscape for signals in the discovery phase
concepts.source_quote: Technology Radar: Monitors external landscape for signals

concepts.name: Real-Time Intelligence
concepts.definition: System that ingests data from Polymarket, HackerNews, arXiv, SEC to feed discovery phase
concepts.source_quote: Real-Time Intelligence: Ingests Polymarket, HackerNews, arXiv, SEC

concepts.name: Veria
concepts.definition: Market validation component that uses prediction markets as truth signals, can take trading action on validated insights
concepts.source_quote: Veria: Market validation (prediction markets as truth signal)

concepts.name: Fractal Security
concepts.definition: Trust layer that provides secure execution of Loop outputs and authorization for autonomous actions
concepts.source_quote: Fractal Security for authorization... Safe autonomous execution

concepts.name: VISLZR
concepts.definition: Component mentioned in implementation phases, appears to be related to agent parity and ecosystem queries

concepts.name: Agent Personas
concepts.definition: Agent configurations that are refined based on what works in The Loop improvement phase
concepts.source_quote: Agent Personas: Refined based on what works

concepts.name: RLM Pattern
concepts.definition: Implementation pattern for how agents interact with memory, uses sub-LLMs for chunk analysis
concepts.source_quote: RLM pattern uses sub-LLMs for chunk analysis

concepts.name: Intent-Aware
concepts.definition: Design principle embodied by The Loop where discovery allows intent to emerge rather than being forced upfront
concepts.source_quote: The Loop embodies Intent-Aware principles: Discovery allows intent to emerge (not forced upfront)

meta.extraction_notes: Document describes a comprehensive self-improving intelligence architecture with multiple interconnected components. Most concepts are well-defined with clear relationships. Implementation is in early phases with detailed roadmap provided.
